forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some early morning breaks in the overcast, otherwise cloudy. High near 20C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 68F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this evening with showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 52F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 15C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 60F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 62F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 63F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 19C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 66F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
